mmTableSorter

restrict: 'A'

NameTypeDesciption
mmTableSorter no parameters
columns Array Column names as Array of strings to show user to select the Column to sort
sort Object Returns Column name selected by user to soft
descending Object Returns true/false on users descending selection
  •    - 
<table class="table"  mm-table-sorter columns="['title', 'due', 'completed', 'order', 'priority']" sort="sort" descending="descending"></table>
<ul class="list-unstyled">
  <li class="col-sm-4" data-ng-repeat="task in tasks | filter:cache.filter | orderBy:sort:descending"><a>
    <div style="position: relative; height: 80px" class="alert alert-success">
      <i class="fa fa-tasks fa-2x" style="color: #428bca"></i>
      <span class="badge pull-right" data-ng-bind="task.priority"></span>                              
      &nbsp;&nbsp; <span style="vertical-align: bottom; font-size: 1.8em" data-ng-bind="task.order"></span> - 
      <span style="vertical-align: bottom; font-size: 1.2em" data-ng-bind="task.title"></span>
    </div></a>
  </li>
</ul>
